questions.question: Ich __________ heute ins Kino gehen, aber ich habe keine Zeit.
questions.english_translation: I would like to go to the cinema today, but I don't have time.
questions.explanation: 'Möchte' expresses a desire or wish to do something.

questions.question: Du __________ die Hausaufgaben machen, bevor du spielen kannst.
questions.english_translation: You must do your homework before you can play.
questions.explanation: 'Musst' indicates obligation: you must do your homework first.

questions.question: Er __________ gestern nicht zur Arbeit gehen, weil er krank war.
questions.english_translation: He could not go to work yesterday because he was sick.
questions.explanation: 'Konnte' expresses ability in the past: he was unable to go to work.

questions.question: Wir __________ mehr Sport treiben, um fit zu bleiben.
questions.english_translation: We should do more sports to stay fit.

questions.question: Ihr __________ hier nicht parken! Das ist verboten.
questions.english_translation: You are not allowed to park here! That is forbidden.
questions.explanation: 'Dürft' indicates permission: you are not allowed to park here.

questions.question: Sie __________ mitkommen, wenn sie möchten.
questions.english_translation: They can come along if they like.

questions.question: Ich __________ früher jeden Tag zur Schule laufen.
questions.english_translation: I had to walk to school every day in the past.
questions.explanation: 'Musste' expresses necessity or obligation in the past.

questions.question: Wir __________ heute einen Ausflug machen, aber das Wetter ist schlecht.
questions.english_translation: We would like to go on a trip today, but the weather is bad.
questions.explanation: 'Möchten' expresses a desire: we would like to go on a trip.
